name: changed-state
helpText: Only triggers when incoming state is different (any state value) from previous state

name: changed-state (init)
helpText: Only triggers when incoming state is different (any state value) from init state

name: stable (changed-state)
helpText: only triggers when state has changed and is the same for 60 seconds

name: alert rollup (summarize)
helpText: Replace your alerting clause with this code.  Allows 5 alerts to be sent then summarize any additional for 3600 seconds (1 hour). We'll receive the first four alerts immediately--and at the end of the hour, a single alert with a summary of all the rest

name: alert throttle (filter)
helpText: Replace your alerting clause with this code.  Allows the first five events through, then ignores all the rest for an 3600 seconds (1 hour)

name: stable+throttle
helpText: Alert when state is stable for 60 seconds and only alert once for 10 minutes
